info.name: Egypt Tours - User API
info.description:
Complete user-facing API for the Egypt Tours Booking Platform.

Organized by feature folders. Use this collection for frontend development.

Source: docs/api/

item.name: Auth
item.description:
Authentication endpoints - register, login, OAuth, password management.

Source: docs/api/auth.md

request.description:
Register a new user account.

Source: docs/api/auth.md → POST /auth/register

response.name: Success - 201

request.description:
Authenticate and receive JWT tokens.

Source: docs/api/auth.md → POST /auth/login

Refresh access token.

Source: docs/api/auth.md → POST /auth/refresh

exec: if (pm.response.code === 200) { var d = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('accessToken', d.data.accessToken); pm.environment.set('tokenExpiry', Date.now() + 3600000); }
